Heidelberg University Germany for Indian Students Approved by MCI

  • About Heidelberg University

About Heidelberg University

Heidelberg University is one of the top{" "} MBBS universities in Germany {" "} that was established in 1386. It has well equipped medical facilities that help the students to enhance their professional skills. It is recognized by the world’s major organizations such as WHO and MCI. It provides the magnificent theoretical as well as practical education which empowers the candidates to become successful practitioners.

Indian Student Admission Procedure

Indian students need to follow the below steps to take admission in the best MBBS universities in Germany:

  • {" "} The students need to apply online at the university website & fill all the details and can send the documents through email.
  • {" "} When the documents will be evaluated, the students will be notified regarding acceptance or rejection of the application.
  • {" "} The eligible students will receive an admission confirmation letter.
  • {" "} Then the students need to make the payment of their admission.
  • {" "} The students will also receive admission letter along with the invitation letter.
  • {" "} The students can then apply for the visa.

Eligibility Criteria of Heidelberg University

The eligibility criteria of the students who want to study in Germany medical college {" "} are as follows:

  • {" "} The students should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 75% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • {" "} The students should be at least 17 years of age to take admission to Germany Medical College.
  • {" "} The students should also qualify for the NEET exam with passing marks to apply for{" "} MBBS universities in Germany.
  • {" "} The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • {" "} The students must not be more than 25 years of age.
Requirements for MBBS Admission

The necessary documents for taking admission to the best{" "} MBBS universities in Germany are the following:

  • {" "} A complete filled application form with all accurate details.
  • {" "} Original and photocopies of Passport.
  • {" "} Birth certificates and other mandatory certificates must be submitted to the concerned authority.
  • {" "} Passport size (3cmX4cm) photographs.
  • {" "} Original and a photocopy of mark sheets of both 10th & 12th standard
  • {" "} A scorecard of NEFT (if required)
  • {" "} Transfer certificate from the previous school
  • {" "} Leaving certificate from the concerned school
  • {" "} A certificate of code of conduct must be submitted
  • {" "} The bank copy of guardians must be submitted which indicates that they have sufficient funds to pay the fees.
  • {" "} A medical checkup certificate is also essential
Heidelberg University Fee Structure
Particular Tuition fees in EUR per year
MBBS fees 154.70
Heidelberg University Facility

Heidelberg University provides the following facilities:

  • {" "} It provides the best available technological assistance and facilities to the students.
  • {" "} It also offers all facilities such as a library, classrooms, reading rooms, clinical training.
  • {" "} It provides a friendly and safe environment with the availability of Indian food.
Heidelberg University Advantages for Indian Student

Heidelberg University provides the following advantages to the Indian students:

  • {" "} There is no requirement for any entrance exam or donation to take admission in Germany Medical College.
  • {" "} Heidelberg University is recognized by MCI and WHO
  • {" "} The cost of living is very affordable during medicine course in Germany.
  • {" "} The students will get a scholarship after clearing the scholarship exam.
  • {" "} The students do not need to pay any capitation fee.
  • {" "} The students get the opportunity to practice medicine under the guidance of renowned doctors.
  • {" "} The tuition fee in Germany medical college is quite low and affordable.
New-Lyf Authorized Indian Partner

New-Lyf education is the authorized Indian partner with the top MBBS universities in Germany. We have already placed hundreds of Indian students in Germany for pursuing{" "} MBBS course in Heidelberg University {" "} that taught MBBS course in English language. We have an expert team of consultants that provide well-researched assistance & comprehensive counseling to the students. We provide complete information about Heidelberg University and clear each doubt of the students so that they can study in the{" "} best Germany medical college {" "} and fulfill their wish.
